data.name: House Flipper - Cyberpunk DLC
data.detailed_description:
Check out other DLCs out!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1569190/House_Flipper__Pets_DLC/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1021110/House_Flipper__Luxury_DLC
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1009560/The_Tenants/


About the Game

The future of Neo-Tokyo is painted in multicolored neon lights that you can view from your new apartment, which was once a hacker's research center.

It's time to refresh the old-school look of this place and breathe more cybernetic spirit into it, and that's all at House Flipper!


Features:
- brand new apartment with unique environment,
- transhumanist hand skin,
- over 70 cyberpunk style items.
data.about_the_game:
The future of Neo-Tokyo is painted in multicolored neon lights that you can view from your new apartment, which was once a hacker's research center.

data.short_description: The Cyberpunk DLC includes: - brand new apartment with unique environment, - transhumanist hand skin, - over 60 cyberpunk style items.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Romanian, Turkish, Hungarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3,20GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 955 3,2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: 3.2GHz Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: 3.5GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 580
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
